document.docAuthor: Ghahari, Hassan, Moulet, Pierre & Rider, David A.
document.masterDocTitle: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: An annotated catalog of the Iranian Pentatomoidea (Hemiptera: Heteroptera: Pentatomomorpha)

subSubSection.paragraph:

;

;

var. persica

: 120
;

var. decipiens Ferrari, 1982 : 551
;

de Bergevin, 1909 : 46 ;

;

;

;

;
Graphosoma semipunctatum

;

Hoberlandt, 1939
: 59
;
Graphosoma semipunctatum

Hoberlandt, 1939
: 59
;
Graphosoma semipunctatum
var. balcanica ,
Hoberlandt, 1939
: 59
;
Graphosoma semipunctatum
var. confuta
Hoberlandt, 1939
: 60
.
General distribution. Mediterranean Basin, Black Sea Region, Central Asia.

Host plants. On Apiaceae (
Heiss 2002
;
Dusoulier & Lupoli 2006
;
Linnavuori 2008
),
Amaranthus albus
( Amaranthaceae ),
Euphorbia glomerifera
( Euphorbiaceae ),
Rumex conglomerateus
( Polygonaceae ) (Sakenin et al . 2008 ), Apiaceae plants (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2010 a
), Asteraceae (
Nateq Golestan et al . 2011
),
Pimpinella anisum
( Apiaceae ) (
Nateq Golestan & Modarres Awal 2012
).
